item.description:
Join us on the yet-to-be-determined clearest night from April 23rd to April 25th for a walk past some of the prettiest cranberry bogs in Myles Standish State Forest.  Bring a flashlight with you for safety but we'll try not to use them.

On the:

  • 23rd, sunset will be at 7:34pm with moonrise at 5:25pm
  • 24th, sunset will be at 7:35pm with moonrise at 6:36pm
  • 25th, sunset will be at 7:36pm and moonrise at 7:48pm.

 

This walk will end by 8:30pm and if people are interested, we could stop by the Little Red Smokehouse afterwards for refreshments.  (It's on Route 58 in Carver, a couple of miles from the forest.)

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: April Fool Moon Walk
